title: How to Clean Picture Glass

steps.headline: Dip a cleaning cloth into hot water.
Use this cloth to clean the glass.
steps.description: Rub well to remove any stains, marks or discolouration.

steps.headline: Polish the glass immediately after cleaning it, using a chamois or tissue paper.
Continue polishing until the glass is dry and glossy.
steps.description: The picture is ready for returning to display.

text: Dip a cleaning cloth into hot water.  Dip in alcohol.  Wring thoroughly.  Use this cloth to clean the glass. Rub well to remove any stains, marks or discolouration. Polish the glass immediately after cleaning it, using a chamois or tissue paper.  Continue polishing until the glass is dry and glossy. The picture is ready for returning to display. Finished.
